availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Carroll County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of A. Gex. Graduated from the Kentucky Military Institute in 1858. Married Ruth C. Ritchey Gex on May 14, 1861 in Gallatin County. Farmer in Carroll County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, p. 535
Catalogue of the Officers and Cadets of the Kentucky Military Institute (Cincinnati: Moore, Wilstach, Keys, and Co., 1858), p. 14
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Gallatin County Marriages, Film #000509036, p. 275
Find A Grave, "Lucien C. Gex (1833- )," Memorial #22884435, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/22884435 (accessed October 28, 2019).
